items.title: Logistics Manager
items.company: Transportation Company. Exclusive contractor for Transneft in the transportation of oversized and heavy cargo.

responsibilities.title: responsibilities:
items: Managing projects for the transportation of oversized cargo
Identifying customer needs and resource planning for client projects
Conducting negotiations
Handling the necessary regulatory documentation
Monitoring customer order execution at all stages

achievements.title: achievements:
items: Developed and implemented an algorithm for calculating resources and costs for customer order execution

items.title: Corporate Client Acquisition Manager
items.company: Industrial and Construction Equipment. The largest supplier of construction and industrial equipment in the Volga Region.

responsibilities.title: responsibilities:
items: Building a database of potential clients
Active sales of construction and industrial equipment
Negotiating with clients and suppliers
Identifying client project needs and resource planning
Ensuring uninterrupted equipment and material deliveries for client tasks

achievements.title: achievements:
items: Achieved an average monthly sales volume of 10 million rubles
Attracted over 50 new clients, including more than 10 at the federal level
Maintained new client relationships for an average of over two years
Participated in major federal projects

items.title: Client Relations Manager
items.company: Building and Finishing Materials. Manufacturer of finishing materials.

responsibilities.title: responsibilities:
items: Active sales
Conducting negotiations at the top management level
NPlanning and developing new projects

achievements.title: achievements:
items: Achieved a personal monthly sales volume exceeding 5 million rubles
Established two new company branches in different regions of the country
